name: AccessOwnership
author: Lennong
about: Sets access permissions & ownership to downloaded files.
requirements: This extension is compatible with NZBGet v24+.
This extension requires Python3.8 and above to be installed on your system.
description: This script modifies access permissions & ownership on downloaded files.

options.name: DestDir
description: Destination directory for downloads.
Set the same 'DestDir' value as set under the 'PATHS' settings.
NOTE: Enable this extension in the 'Extensions' setting under 'EXTENSION SCRIPTS' after this extension is configured and saved.

options.name: Access
description: Sets access permissions to downloaded files. Use positive integers only.
Default = '660'.

options.name: Owner
description: Sets Owner (uid) to downloaded files. Use positive integers only.
Default = '1000'.

options.name: Group
description: Set Group (gid) to downloaded files. Use positive integers only.
Default = '1000'.

options.name: Name
description: Category name.

options.name: DestDir
description: Destination directory for this category.
Set the same related 'Name' and 'DestDir' values as set in the 'CATEGORIES' settings.
NOTE: Enable this extension in the 'Extensions' setting under 'CATEGORIES' after this extension is configured and saved.

options.name: Access
description: Sets access permissions for downloaded files in this category. Use positive integers only.
Default = '660'.

options.name: Owner
description: Sets Owner (uid) to downloaded files in this category. Use positive integers only.
Default = '1000'.

options.name: Group
description: Sets Group (gid) to downloaded files in this category. Use positive integers only.
Default = '1000'.

commands.name: Test
description: Click to test the settings:
CATEGORIES: extension coorelates with main program
PATHS:      extension coorelates with main program
ACCESS:     extension checks validity of mask input
OWNER:      extension checks validity of UID input and present UID in system
GROUP:      extension checks validity of GID input and present GID in system
